":[{"internalType":"address","name":"rootOwner","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tokenId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"rootOwnerOfChild","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"rootOwner","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"parentTokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"isParent","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fromTokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"toContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"toTokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"childContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"childTokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"safeTransferChild","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fromTokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"childContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"childTokenId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"transferChild","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Interface for ERC-998 Top-Down Composable Non-Fungible Tokens ERC-998 allows NFTs to own other NFTs and ERC-20 tokens, creating composable token structures. This interface defines the top-down composable pattern where a parent token can own child tokens. Based on ERC-998 specification: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-998","events":{"ReceivedChild(address,uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a child token is received by a parent address of the child token","childTokenId":"The token ID of the child token","to":"The address receiving the child token","tokenId":"The parent token ID"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"childTokensOf(uint256,address)":{"details":"Get all child tokens owned by a parent token","params":{"childContract":"The contract address of child token ID to query"},"returns":{"rootOwner":"The address of the root owner"}},"rootOwnerOfChild(uint256)":{"details":"Get the root owner and parent token ID of a token","params":{"tokenId":"The token childTokensOf(uint256,address).details: Get all child tokens owned by a parent token

params.childContract: The contract address of child tokens

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Callback for receiving child tokens via safeTransferFrom

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token

returns._0: The function selector to confirm receipt

ownerOfChild(address,uint256).details: Get the owner of a child token

params.childContract: The contract address of the child token
params.childTokenId: The token ID of the child token

returns.parentTokenId: The token ID of the parent
returns.parentTokenOwner: The address of the parent token's owner

rootOwnerOf(uint256).details: Get the root owner of a token (traverses up the ownership tree)

returns.rootOwner: The address of the root owner

rootOwnerOfChild(uint256).details: Get the root owner and parent token ID of a token

returns.isParent: Whether the root owner is a parent token
returns.parentTokenId: The token ID of the parent (0 if no parent)
returns.rootOwner: The address of the root owner

safeTransferChild(uint256,address,uint25.details: Transfer child token from parent to another parent token

params.childContract: The contract address of the child token
params.childTokenId: The token ID of the child token
params.toContract: The contract address of the new parent token

transferChild(uint256,address,address,ui.details: Transfer child token from parent to address

params.childContract: The contract address of the child token
params.childTokenId: The token ID of the child token
params.to: The address to receive the child token
